description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Alloa Athletic vs Dumbarton in the Scottish League One
title: Alloa Athletic vs Dumbarton: Scottish League One stats & head-to-head
title_page: Alloa Athletic vs Dumbarton: Scottish League One stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 4 minutes of added time.
Goal!
Goal! Alloa Athletic 2, Dumbarton 3. Mark Durnan (Dumbarton) header from very close range to the top right corner. Assisted by Tony Wallace with a cross following a corner.
Goal!
Goal! Alloa Athletic 2, Dumbarton 2. Conor Sammon (Alloa Athletic) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Scott Taggart.
